overview: Chelas nha Kau (Chelas my place) is a kaleidoscope of recordings taken between 2016 and 2019. A film that reveals various layers of what it means to be a young person in a social housing project and lets you into the inner world of a group of friends for whom “Chelas is the capital of Lisbon and Lisbon is the capital of Portugal”.
title: Chelas nha kau
